member.name: T:SlackStackFeeder.StackFunctions
member.summary: Azure WebJobs functions for interacting with Slack teams.

member.name: M:SlackStackFeeder.StackFunctions.StackFeeder(SlackStackJobs.Models.QueuedJob,SlackStackJobs.Models.SlackStackState,SlackStackJobs.Models.SlackTeam,System.DateTime,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: WebJob function to post new Stack Exchange messages to one or more Slack channels
member.param: Current state of the Slack connection to Stack Exchange
Information about a Slack team with one or more Stack Exchange subscriptions
Date this feed is being processed

member.name: M:SlackStackFeeder.StackFunctions.Slackify(System.String)
member.summary: Desperate attempt to bludgeon HTML into something resembling Slack markdown so we can put it into an attachment. This can't ever possibly work 100% of the time but we do what we can.
member.param: Original HTML markup read from the Stack RSS feed.
member.returns: Equivalent (roughly) text marked up using Slack Markdown
